doc.previous: where  The law expressed as an equation  Strictly speaking this law applies only to point like objects If the objects have spatial extent the true force has to be found by integrating the forces between the various points
doc.after: The Gravitational equation that is given above is similar to that of Coulomb s Law which deals with the electrostatic force between two charged particles
